title: E-commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with headless CMS integration.
longDescription: Built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, this e-commerce platform features a headless CMS, cart functionality, payment processing with Stripe, and user authentication.

title: Lenity Banking
description: A modern banking dashboard with real-time monitoring and analytics.
longDescription: Lenity Banking is a small banking dashboard built with Next.js, Sentry for error tracking, and Dwella for UI components. It features secure user authentication, real-time transaction monitoring, and interactive dashboards for better financial insights.

title: Decentralized Lending DApp
description: A fully on-chain decentralized borrowing protocol allowing users to deposit collateral, borrow tokens, and manage repayments.
longDescription: Built a decentralized lending platform using Solidity and Hardhat for smart contracts. Integrated the contracts into a React + TypeScript frontend with wagmi, RainbowKit, and ethers.js for wallet connection and multi-chain support. Features include collateral deposits, borrowing, repayments, and withdrawals, with a responsive UI built using Tailwind CSS.
